mapper.select: SELECT worksheet_id, amount, work_date, w.machine_id, machine_name, w.product_id, product_name, w.worker_id, worker_name, create_datetime FROM WORKSHEET w JOIN MACHINE m ON m.machine_id = w.machine_id JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.product_id = w.product_id JOIN WORKER wk ON wk.worker_id = w.worker_id

SELECT worksheet_id, amount, work_date, w.machine_id, machine_name, product_id, worker_id, create_datetime FROM WORKSHEET w JOIN MACHINE m ON m.machine_id = w.machine_id WHERE w.machine_id = #{machineId} AND work_date = CURDATE()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORKSHEET (amount, work_date, machine_id, product_id, worker_id, create_datetime) VALUES (#{amount}, #{workDate}, #{machineId}, #{productId}, #{workerId}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE WORKSHEET SET amount = #{amount}, work_date = #{workDate}, machine_id = #{machineId}, product_id = #{productId}, worker_id = #{workerId} WHERE worksheet_id = #{worksheetId}
